article.title: A-T Solutions to Provide Counter-IED Training in Afghanistan
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: A-T Solutions Incorporated, Fredericksburg, Virginia, was awarded a $9,851,037 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the modification of an existing contract to provide counter-improvised explosive device training programs in support of the Joint Improvised Explosive Device Defeat Organization. Work will be performed in Afghanistan, with an estimated completion date of Sept. 30, 2014.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
